faq.question: What is included in the cab fare?
faq.answer: The fare includes the driver's allowance, fuel charges, and state taxes. Toll charges and parking fees are extra unless specified.

faq.question: Can I book a one-way cab from Delhi to Agra?
faq.answer: Yes, you can easily book a one-way cab. The prices listed in the grid above are for one-way trips. Just select your car and proceed to book.

faq.question: What happens if I cancel my booking?
faq.answer: You can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the pickup time for a full refund. A cancellation fee may apply for cancellations within 24 hours.
